defaultOptimalSlot: Default optimal slot for subjects with unspecified optimal slot. 0 means first lesson of the day
defaultTeacherArriveEarly: Whether a teacher should appear early on morning
defaultStudentArriveEarly: Whether a student should appear early on morning
maxTeacherSlots: Maximum amount of slots in a row, which can be assigned to teacher
maxStudentSlots: Maximum amount of slots in a row, which can be assigned to student
teachersPenaltyWeight: Multiplier for teachers penalties, the higher this number, the more we try to please teachers
studentsPenaltyWeight: Multiplier for students penalties, the higher this number, the more we try to please students

gapTeacher: Penalty for having gap in teacher schedule
gapStudent: Penalty for having gap in student schedule
unoptimalSlot: Penalty for not having subject at optimal slot.

DP1_English_Literature_SL.comment: Literary analysis benefits from stabilized verbal processing later in the day.

DP1_English_Literature_HL.comment: Extended essay work and close reading profit from early‑afternoon linguistic focus.

DP1_Mathematics_SL.comment: Problem‑solving is strongest first period when working‑memory and alertness are freshest.

DP1_Mathematics_HL.comment: Higher‑level math needs peak cognitive resources available right at the start of the day.

DP1_Chemistry_SL.comment: Hands‑on labs benefit from high alertness that persists through the second morning slot.

DP1_Chemistry_HL.comment: Advanced chemistry calculations need strong focus still available early in the day.
